mapper.select: select * from board order by ref desc, step asc
mapper.insert: insert into board values( seq_board_idx.nextval, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pwd}, #{ip}, sysdate, 0, seq_board_idx.currval, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update board set readhit = readhit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
update board set step = step + 1 where ref = #{ref} and step > #{step}
